resources.string: IMPORTANT: We do not reccomend changing your base password often, as the changes made in this app may not reflect the changes on your actual passwords.
Pick something that you\'ll remember, becuase changing it will require you to change all your website passwords
Use a password with 8 or more characters, at least one capital, and at least one number. This will satisfy most websites\' password requirements
If you want a simple base password, use a more complex algorithm that will satisfy these constraints
